item.title: Tips for Maintaining Motivation During Tough Times
item.description: Life inevitably throws challenges our way—personal setbacks, career struggles, health issues, or emotional turbulence. During such times, maintaining motivation can feel nearly impossible. You may feel stuck, overwhelmed, or emotionally drained, and pushing forward might seem like a heavy burden.
